Getting started
-----

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("ggplot2")
require(ggplot2)

# Data Note: ggplot2 requires data.frames
```
----
```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
data(msleep)
alt <- ggplot(msleep)

ggplot(msleep, aes(x=bodywt, y=brainwt)) + geom_point()
# ... is the same as: 
alt + geom_point(aes(x=bodywt, y=brainwt))
```
